name: Duality (itch) (Night)
description:
This is Duality, a puzzle game made for the New Years Jam. You play as a wizard, capable of splitting away from his body and changing to a ghost. As that happens, time freezes, and ethereal paths are revealed to you.  As a ghost you can dash through the air and hit switches to advance through the level as a human. The player has three lives, but the ghost can die as many times as possible. Once you reach the end, you win!

~ CONTROLS ~

<- : Move Left

-> : Move Right

Space : Jump

F : Switch states

R : Recall

D : Dash

Made by: xChratis & Night0
